enum.name: errorCode
enum.description: The unique identifier of an error

sbe:message.name: AddStreamRequest
sbe:message.description: Adds a gateway stream to a broker

field.name: id
field.description: The unique ID of the stream to add

data.name: streamType
data.description: The type of the stream, used for aggregation

data.name: metadata
data.description: Optional, free-form metadata associated with the stream

sbe:message.name: AddStreamResponse
sbe:message.description: Result of adding a gateway stream to a broker

sbe:message.name: RemoveStreamRequest
sbe:message.description: Removes a gateway stream from a broker

field.name: id
field.description: The unique ID of the stream to remove

sbe:message.name: RemoveStreamResponse
sbe:message.description: Result of removing a gateway stream to a broker

sbe:message.name: PushStreamRequest
sbe:message.description: Pushes a payload over a stream

field.name: id
field.description: The unique stream ID to push on

data.name: payload
data.description: The payload to push on the stream

sbe:message.name: PushStreamResponse
sbe:message.description: Result of pushing a payload to a stream
